00025 #ifndef _GFX_INDEXEDPOINT3ARRAY_
00026 #define _GFX_INDEXEDPOINT3ARRAY__

00028 #include <base/Point3>
00029 
00030 #include <gfx/gfx>
00031 #include <gfx/Triangle3>
00032 #include <gfx/TriangleContainer>
00033 
00034 
00035 
00036 namespace gfx {
00037 
00038 
00039 class IndexedPoint3Array : public base::Object
00040 {
00041 public:
00042   IndexedPoint3Array();
00043   IndexedPoint3Array(const array<base::Point3>& a);
00044   IndexedPoint3Array(const TriangleContainer& a);
00045   IndexedPoint3Array(const IndexedPoint3Array& ipa);
00046   virtual ~IndexedPoint3Array();
00047 
00048   virtual String className() const { return String("IndexedPoint3Array"); }
00049 
00050   Int addPoint(const base::Point3& p);
00051   Int indexOf(const base::Point3& p) throw(std::invalid_argument);
00052 
00053   const base::Point3& operator[](Int i) const
00054     { return points[index[i]]; }
00055 
00056   const base::Point3& operator()(Int i) const
00057     { return points[index[i-1]]; }
00058 
00059   Int size() const { return index.size(); }
00060 
00061   const array<base::Point3>& getPointArray() const;
00062   const array<Int>&          getIndexArray() const;
00063 
00064 protected:
00065   bool findPoint(const base::Point3& p, Int& index);
00066 
00067   array<base::Point3> points;
00068   array<Int>          index;
00069 };
